bibl.title: Another Look at Some Officials in Early ‘Abbasid Egypt.
bibl.note: Based on the study of Arabic, Coptic and Greek documents. - I. Yahya b. Hilal: Revisiting his Dossier. - II. ‘Abd Allah b. Qays: An Unrecognised Pagarch of the Fayyum. - III. Halid b. Yazid: Yahya b. Hilal's successor? - IV. ‘Abd Allah b. ‘Abd al-Rahman: A Pagarch?
bibl.seg: GONIS Nikolaos, Another Look at Some Officials in Early ‘Abbasid Egypt.
